column9: Hi Guys!   Starting 01.10.2017 for an unlimited period,  2 rooms available in a 4.5 rooms flat located between Hardbrücke and Wipkingen. This is an ideal location to commute around the city. Bus stop Rosengartenstrasse directly upstairs with 46, 33, 72 heading in 10 min to HB and Wiedikon area. Trams 13 from Wipkingerplatz.  10min to Letten for a swim during summer :-) 15 minutes to the airport with the S24 from Bahnhof Wipkingen.  There are a Coop and Denner 5 min by walk.   The appartment is 110 m2 with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is an additional extra small room to be shared between us. It is configured as a duplex with terrasse surrounding the whole city and during sunny days with mountains view :-) The kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a steamer. There are a washing and drying machine in the flat as well.   Keller and bycicle storage available as well. Additional storage on the terrasse for the barbecue 🍗 and any other stuff we don't know where to put ;-)  1 st room: 1,290 CHF 2nd room: 1,350 CHF  We also have to share the cleaning company who is coming 3 hours every 2 weeks and the UPC internet cable. In front of the house you have all sorts of shopping and also the Limmat is directly in front of the front door. By train you are in Zurich in 15 minutes. Besides, I have two cats (1.5 years old) who live with us. They are totally cuddly and very attached. Of course it is up to you whether you want the cats in the room or rather outside.  Since I am a very tidy and clean person, it is important to me that the future roommate also attaches great importance to it.  The rent is monthly CHF 1220.00, which includes all additional costs such as electricity, TV (Swisscom TV / Billag), internet, fixed telephone. This means you do not have any monthly additional costs for the apartment.  Also temporary to let.  Interested? Then I would be very happy about your message.
